alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:23AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Benton, eastern Craig, Delaware, Ottawa and northeastern Mayes Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 723 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Edna to 5 miles northeast of Leach. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bella Vista... Miami... Baxter Springs... Jay... Grove... Commerce... Gravette... Fairland... Afton... Quapaw... Langley... Welch... Bernice... Ketchum... Bluejacket... Wyandotte... Disney... Treece... Picher... Honey Creek State Park... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 286 and 324. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Oklahoma.
